title: Destroy Windows 10 Spying 1.6 Build 717 Rollup Edition
description:
Destroy Windows 10 Spying 1.6 Build 717 Rollup Edition Final Portable [4REALTORRENTZ] 

Destroy Windows 10 Spying is a portable app that can block anonymous data being sent, remove apps that cant be removed the standard way and more. I liked that it can remove some of the Windows default programs that can be removed under Apps Features, an annoyance I immediately discovered since I prefer to slim down windows.

Features:

- Uninstall Keylogger in Windows 10
- Disable telemetry
- Disable cortana (she is watching you)
- Disable Windows Defender' (he's watching you)
- Disable job, to send your data* Uninstall Metro apps (they also monitor your actions)
- Add spy host M$ hosts
- Creation of recovery points for a rollback of the system to the state before the action of the program
- Many utilities.
- And many other features...
